question: The SWAMIH fund that has been created recently by the Government pertains to which sector?
explanation:
The Government of India has created a new “Special Window for Completion of Affordable and Mid-Income Housing” Investment Fund (SWAMIH investment fund).
This is created to fund stalled housing projects that are net worth positive. These projects would include the ones that have been declared as NPA and those pending before the National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT) under the IBC.
